name: infisical
description: Infisical is an open source secret management platform for developers. It centralizes environment variables and secrets, provides access controls, audits and integrations with CI, and is available as both a cloud and self hosted solution.
features: Centralized Secrets: Store API keys, passwords, and environment variables in one secure location.
Environment Management: Organize secrets by environment (dev, staging, production).
CI/CD Integration: Inject secrets into GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, and other pipelines.
Access Controls: Define granular permissions for who can read or modify secrets.
Audit Logging: Track all secret access and modifications for compliance.
Version History: View and rollback to previous versions of secrets.
SDK Support: Integrate with applications using official SDKs for multiple languages.
Self-Hosted or Cloud: Choose between self-hosting or managed cloud deployment.
